title: Quartz & granite countertops, BBQ/dining areas, Wine cellar
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 857 Sq.
Introducing TriVista on Speer, offering luxury studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments anchored in downtown Denver’s coolest corner: The Golden Triangle Creative District.
Walk to the city’s best artistic, historical, and outdoor attractions.
Take in the breathtaking mountain views.
TriVista truly satisfies your need for beauty, adventure, and escape.

2-level parking garage, Balconies & private patios, Stainless steel appliances, Air conditioning & heating, Studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom & 3-bedroom units available, Boutique-style interiors, Designer backsplash, Wood-style flooring, Quartz & granite countertops, Electric or gas ranges, Two interior design schemes to choose from, Electronic lock system, In-home washer & dryer, Tandem & private garage boxes

Pet spa & grooming station, Expansive two-story fitness facility, Demonstration kitchen, Car charging stations for electric vehicles, Dining lounge, Bicycle/ski repair & storage, Outdoor lounge with TVs, Rooftop deck with mountain, City Hall & downtown views, BBQ/dining areas, Conference spaces & individual work stations, Gameroom with pool tables, Two courtyards with firepits, Ask about furnished options, Yoga/spin studio & on-demand classes, Luxurious pool & spa with lounge, Wine cellar, Live/work townhomes available, Direct access to the Cherry creek bike path
